story:
Once upon a time, in a lush green forest in Thailand, there was a kind and gentle elephant named Chai. Chai was not like the other elephants in the forest. He had a beautiful, shimmering, golden tusk that sparkled in the sun.

Chai was very proud of his golden tusk and took good care of it. He would polish it every day with a soft leaf, and it would shine like a star in the night sky. The other animals in the forest were amazed by Chai's golden tusk and would often gather around him to hear stories of his adventures.

One day, while Chai was wandering in the forest, he came across a beautiful river. The river was crystal clear, and Chai could see fish swimming around and playing in the water. Chai was feeling hot and thirsty, so he decided to take a drink from the river.

As Chai bent down to take a sip, he noticed something unusual in the water. It was a tiny, sparkling stone that was shimmering and glowing in the sunlight. Chai was intrigued and picked up the stone with his trunk. As he held it up to examine it, he realized that it was a magical stone that could grant him one wish.

Chai was overjoyed and thought about what he wanted to wish for. He had everything he needed in the forest, but he wanted to share his happiness with his friends and family. So, he decided to wish for a never-ending supply of fruits and vegetables for all the animals in the forest.

With a wave of his golden tusk, Chai made his wish, and the magical stone granted it. From that day onwards, the forest was filled with an abundance of delicious fruits and vegetables that never ran out. The animals were delighted, and they thanked Chai for his kind gesture.

Chai was happy to see his friends and family enjoying the food, and he felt grateful for the magical stone that had made his wish come true. He kept the stone in a safe place and continued to live happily in the forest, sharing his joy and kindness with everyone he met.

As the sun set and the stars came out, Chai would look up at the sky and think about how lucky he was to have such a beautiful golden tusk and a magical stone. He would close his eyes and drift off to sleep, dreaming of all the adventures that awaited him in the forest.

The end. Goodnight, my dear child. Sleep tight and have sweet dreams.
